__PACKAGE_NAME__: The name of this package, consumed by a Spork App Instance [ex: spork/template-plugin]
__DESCRIPTION__: The package description, explain what this is.
__NAMESPACE__: Package namespace, note there isn't a trailing \ [Spork\TemplatePlugin]
__FEATURE_NAME__: The name of this feature in lower case [template-plugin]
__CAPITAL_FEATURE_NAME__: The name of this feature with a capital first letter [TemplatePlugin]
